      • getDomainArgs

        public static final java.lang.String getDomainArgs(java.lang.String progname,
                                                   java.lang.String[] args)
        returns the domain bus.
        Parameters:
        progname - The name of your program, for error message
        args - the String[] of arguments passed to your main()
        Returns:
        returns the domain bus, ascending priority : ivy default bus, IVY_BUS property, -b domain on the command line
        Since:
        1.2.8
